net.pandoragames.far.ui.swing.component.listener

Interface TabListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionPreview, ActionView

    public interface TabListener
    Interface for components on an OperationTabPane. Allows the component to get informed about changes of the state of its tab.
    Author:
    Olivier Wehner

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.Integer ANYTAB
      Constant for listener registration representing any tab.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void tabSelected(TabEvent event)
      Called when the components tab is selected.
      void tabUnselected(TabEvent event)
      Called when the components tab becomes unselected.

    • Field Detail

      • ANYTAB

        static final java.lang.Integer ANYTAB
        Constant for listener registration representing any tab. A listener registered with this constant will be called for every tab event not matter what tab index.

    • Method Detail

      • tabSelected

        void tabSelected(TabEvent event)
        Called when the components tab is selected.
        Parameters:
        event - related event

      • tabUnselected

        void tabUnselected(TabEvent event)
        Called when the components tab becomes unselected.
        Parameters:
        event - related event
